name: Ambassador to the Deep
description:
Run jump, jump again, and jump a third time as you try and fail to survive the onslaught from below! Your enemies will fall instantly with the right attack, but so will you.

Move around with WASD or the arrow keys, and slash your sword with the Left mouse button.
The game can be beaten in less than a minute, if you are fast enough.

All content was made by me, either with GameMaker, or sfxr, with the exception of the music, which was made by HalcyonicFalconX for Epic Battle Fantasy 3, and is public domain.

Made for Ludum Dare 29 - Beneath the Surface.
